text:
Sadness at sea, deep in thought.  
No escape from this wine.  
Svidrigaïlov: “I should’ve gone to the North Pole.”  

Raskolnikov: “Why would you go up?”  
Svidrigaïlov: “I… No, oh, no.”  
Raskolnikov: “Is he serious?”  

---  

Memories of Marfa Petrovna linger.  
Trust and money complicate feelings.  
Svidrigaïlov: “I managed the estate well.”  

Raskolnikov: “Missing her?”  
Svidrigaïlov: “Perhaps. Do you believe in ghosts?”  
Raskolnikov: “What ghosts?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Svidrigaïlov reflects on his past and the influence of Marfa Petrovna while contemplating the idea of ghosts.
